entry.title: [EU/USA][Backbone] - Degraded backbone
entry.content:
Jun 29, 11:35 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 28/06/2022 20:00 UTC
End Time : 29/06/2022 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Backbone between Europe and North America is back in service .
Root cause : Fibre Cut in Baltimore

Jun 29, 09:40 UTC
Update - UPDATE: All splicing efforts have now been completed. Service validations are currently in progress.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Jun 29, 07:51 UTC
Update - UPDATE: All service affecting alarms have cleared. Service validations are currently underway. Once all repairs are completed and services are confirmed to be restored, a final notification will be provided

Jun 29, 01:35 UTC
Identified - Identified : It has been determined that the damage was caused by construction activity. Our teams and provider are currently working on this issue.

Jun 28, 22:04 UTC
Update - Update : The links that went down have been isolated, service is progressively coming back. Our teams continue to work on this incident to restore the service quickly.

Jun 28, 20:55 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/06/2022 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Backbone links between Europe and North America are currently down. Some customers may face some latency.
Ongoing actions : Our tams are investigating and working with our provider provider for a quick resolution.
